author: Xbox
description:
The Solisium's Awakening Update is now live. Command the battlefield with the new Orb weapon, capture objectives, complete special missions or engage the enemy in the new Battlegrounds mode, call a slice of Solisium home through the new Housing system, and experience even more satisfying progression through the Hyperboost Feature Set. Other features include the new Abyss Stone PvP mode, Dimensional Trial Revamp, Castle Siege Map Redesign, Tier 3 gear, quality of life improvements, and more.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/throne-and-liberty/9MWWJQLQ590G/0010

description:
It's Time to Unleash the Beast

Dying Light: The Beast is finally here! It’s time for you to UNLEASH THE BEAST!

Dying Light: The Beast pushes what you know and love about the series to the extreme. The combat - more physical and brutal. The parkour - more grounded and realistic. The night - more tense and claustrophobic.

author: Xbox
description:
Frostpunk 2, the award-winning survival city-builder, is finally coming to XBOX Series X|S. Managing your city in the frozen world can now be enjoyed from your couch with a gamepad in your hands. Bringing Frostpunk 2 from PC to consoles, required adapting complex mouse-and-keyboard controls to a gamepad, and reworking the UI to ensure the grand strategy experience feels natural on XBOX.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/frostpunk-2/9N0KN24FWP6B

author: Xbox
description:
Follow Kiki, Jackie, Alfie, and Brayan as they explore a day in San Vansterdam.

Drop In to skate.™ and experience improved Flick-It controls, the rich physics based skateboarding gameplay that provides those “only in skate.™“ moments and off-board exploration for full freedom in the online multiplayer world of San Vansterdam.

Your new favorite hangout awaits. 

Play free* now on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/skate/9phf9k5q6zlz

*Applicable platform account and platform subscription (sold separately) may be required. Persistent internet connection and EA account required. Age restrictions apply. Includes optional in-game purchases."

description:
Arctic Awakening is available now on Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/arctic-awakening/9N87DRF76K0B

Arctic Awakening is a first-person narrative adventure set in the unforgiving Arctic. Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy bot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're in San Francisco, California at Double Fine Productions, and we’re getting an inside look at the highly anticipated game, Keeper. We get to play the game, and then, we sit down and talk to a few of the devs about this beautiful and weird third-person adventure game all about connection and growth.

00:00 Introduction
01:16 What is Keeper?
02:11 What does it mean to play a lighthouse?
05:02 Puzzles
06:38 Where did the inspiration come from?
07:55 Building the emotional connection between Twig and the Lighthouse
10:43 How to tell a story without dialogue or traditional HUD
12:36 "Weird but chill" vibe
15:03 Aesthetic inspiration
19:31 Special area of gameplay
21:37 Building emotions with music
24:54 Game design
28:15 What are you most excited for players to experience?
31:09 Final thoughts
32:01 Outro 

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast 

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx
title: Keeper: A Deep Dive Into The Beauty of Weird But Chill | Official Xbox Podcast
